sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { QuizData } from 'src/app/models/models'; import { QuizService } from 'src/app/services/quiz.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quiz', templateUrl: './quiz.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quiz.component.scss'] }) export class QuizComponent implements OnInit { quizItems!: QuizData[]; curIdx$!: Observable; correctCount$!: Observable checkAnswer$!: Observable constructor(private quizService: QuizService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.quizItems = this.quizService.quizData this.curIdx$ = this.quizService.currentIdx$; this.correctCount$ = this.quizService.correctCount$; this.checkAnswer$ = this.quizService.checkAnswer$ } handleNext(i: number, corAnsw: number) { this.quizService.handleNext(i, corAnsw) } }

{{ quiz.question }}

  • {{ i + 1 }}.

    {{ answer }}
